# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

<!-- run throws: true -->

```javascript
var foo = 'bar';
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
